title: Scott bike catalog
content:
Can you please help me to identify this font from Scott product catalog, or suggest a similar font?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Genius font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803160631/http:/typophile.com/files/Genius%20font.jpg) | 20.26 KB |
author: NalimAsh

comments.content: Don't think it's a font as it, more probably a custom job based on some techy freebie to me like [Concielian](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803160631/http:/www.dafont.com/concielian.font), [Supreme](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803160631/http:/www.dafont.com/supreme.font) or [Bauer](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803160631/http:/www.urbanfonts.com/fonts/Bauer.htm).
